Package.Name: 15m Spot Circle
Package.InternalNotes: Get the one in the Jove folder cause Ekspoint is banned
Package.Author: Jove
Package.Description:
Shows a 15m Circle around your tank. 
It shows the minimum distance behind bushes to stay hidden if you are shooting.
The Ring is not displayed in sniper view.
color = green

Package.Name: ATAC - enemy in 150m range [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: use the 150m one
Package.Author: Makct
Package.Description: This mod shows a notification if an enemy is within a range of 150m and is not in your direction of view.

Package.Name: Crew skills in battle (press "B") [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing todo
Package.Author: RaJCeL
Package.Description: This mod visualizes crews skills and perks during the battle. \r\nActivate it by pressing "B".

Package.Name: Damage Indicator
Package.Description: Changes the look of the damage indicators when you are shot.

Package.Description: this changes the Fps/Ping-Bar in the upper left corner.

Package.Name: Danger Lights / Enemy Announcer [by {author}]

Package.Author: Protanki
Package.Description: This mod shows colored lights to indicate if your vehicle is visible.\r\nIt can also play a sound if you are in the line of sight of an enemy outside the screen.

Package.Name: Enable and choose custom UI type:
Play a warning sound once the enemy started to go out of sight
Continous notification sound for out-of-screen enemies you are in direct line of sight
Highlight spotted enemies on the minimap for which you are in direct visibility.

Tank Rating Colors [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: Maybe conflict with "Contour skins with areas of penetration" or just hard to see
Package.Author: CHAMPi
Package.Description:
Repaints tanks based on winrate or WGR value without any textures!
use ESC in the hangar and then click on MOD Settings

features:
 - you can decide which tank parts are painted (hull, chassis, turret, gun)
 - you can choose which tanks are painted (enemy tanks, ally tanks and/or your own tank)
 - you can control if camouflages are removed before the tanks are painted (not all are currently removed - in work!)
 - you can set the gloss and metallic effect for the color.
 - graphical user interface to control the most important settings

Package.Name: --- Recolor tanks by ---
Package.InternalNotes: empty header

Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing to do

Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing to do

Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing to do

Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing to do

Package.Name: Paint whole allied tanks (rather then just turret)
Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing to do

Package.Name: Paint whole enemy tanks (rather then just turret)
Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing to do

Package.Name: OldSkool
Package.InternalNotes: https://promod.reidarty.de/promod\r\nfile brc.zip

Package.Name: PROTanki
Package.InternalNotes: use efficiency,1.json from the unpacker
Package.Description:
Combat efficiency calculator for World of Tanks.

Maud calculates the expected damage for each tank right during the battle.

The negative value of the damage shows how much you need to fill the damage so that its value is above average.

He considers the costs of silver spent in combat.

Package.InternalNotes: its a patch: nothing todo
Package.Description: Mod is showing some statistics in battle and replays. Mod doesn’t need XVM to work.\r\n\r\nNot working on NA server as of 1.5.1 (06-15-2019)
